title: Casian
description: An unnamed settlement close to the modern village of Casian is also not far from the rock inscriptions from the È˜eremet forest. The rock inscriptions mention the limits of the community of the Kasians and their caves. A house from the Roman period and some coins were found here. The relation between the settlement and the toponym Kasiana or Kasianon is not clear, because of the position of the inscriptions.

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth on the basis of site visit and familiarity.
